title: Top Sprint League
description: A virtual Formula 1 league featuring dynamic content like race news, calendar, countdown to the next race, standings, and more. Built with GraphQL for easy maintenance and expansion.

title: Wedding Website
description: A complete wedding website with all the essential details for the event, offering easy access to information like the schedule, venue, RSVP, and more.

title: Ignite Lab React
description: A platform for accessing programming classes with a user account. Features dynamic data management via a database, ensuring easy updates and maintenance. Developed during Rocketseat's Ignite Lab week.
